DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study ass body change blood level single dose valsartan 160 mg tablet Japanese formulation valsartan 160 mg tablet global formulation fast condition healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: To Compare Blood Level Marketed Japanese Valsartan Tablet Formulation v Global Valsartan Tablet Formulation Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy , male female subject age 18 45 year age ( inclusive ) In good health Female subject either surgically sterilize least 6 month prior study participation postmenopausal ( regular menstrual bleeding least 2 year ) Body mass index within range 18.5 28 kg/m2 weigh least 45 kg Smokers Use prescription drug within 4 week prior dose , overthecounter medication ( vitamin , herbal supplement , dietary supplement , potassium supplement ) within 2 week prior dose . Paracetamol acceptable Participation clinical investigation within 4 week prior dose Donation loss 400 mL blood within 8 week prior first dose Significant illness within 2 week prior dose . History clinically significant cardiac abnormality , faint , low blood pressure upon stand , irregular heartbeat . History acute chronic bronchospastic disease ( include asthma chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , treat untreated ) . History clinically significant drug allergy history atopic allergy ( asthma , urticaria , eczematous dermatitis ) . Known hypersensitivity severe reaction valsartan similar drug Any surgical medical condition might significantly alter absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion drug may jeopardize subject case participation study . History immunodeficiency disease , include positive HIV ( ELISA Western blot ) test result . A positive Hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) Hepatitis C test result . History drug alcohol abuse within 6 month prior dose Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
DOC.keyword: Relative bioavailability , formulation , Japanese , valsartan , healthy subject
